ing: 1 (16 ounce) jar green salsa (such as Bobby Salazar'sÂ® Chile Verde Salsa), or to taste
1 (8 ounce) package shredded Mexican cheese blend
des: "This is an amazing and delicious avocado dip. Randy, a nurse I work with, gave me his original recipe and said I could share it. It makes a lot so you might cut in half but not the avocados. For extra flavor add Poco PicaÂ® taco sauce."
ins: Mix mashed avocado, sour cream, and green salsa together in a bowl; stir cheese, tomato, and red onion into the avocado mixture.
